HiddenText.Name: My state is not on the approved list, when will BYU-Idaho establish a hiring presence there?
HiddenText.OpenningText: My state is not on the approved list, when will BYU-Idaho establish a hiring presence there?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Due to the different regulations and requirements for establishing a hiring presence in each state, it is difficult to say when additional states will be approved.
